General information

Perfect Conditions for startups and IT developers

«NEW-UKRAINE» is an innovative IT technopark that will make it possible to achieve a significant technological breakthrough.

Kyiv is a place with a unique natural landscape, excellent ecology - ideal conditions for innovative activity. Located in the city of Kyiv - the pearl of Ukrainian lands, "NEW-UKRAINE" is an innovative platform that can provide everything that a modern IT specialist needs.
